Hero.title: Among the best in setting up and establishing companies online or from our offices in Morocco.
Hero.subtitle: TAW 10 is not just a simple address. It's the momentum that propels your business to new heights. Approved by the Moroccan State, our mission is to transform every step of your entrepreneurial journey into a simple, smooth experience, and above all, tailored to your unique vision.

Contact.title: Ready to Launch Your Project?
Contact.subtitle: Contact Us
Contact.description: At TAW 10, we are committed to turning your administrative challenges into growth opportunities. Let's talk about your vision.

Services.title: Our Areas of Expertise
Services.subtitle: Complete Solutions for Entrepreneurs
Services.description: At TAW 10, we propel your ambitions with tailored solutions and recognized expertise in the heart of Marrakech.

domiciliation-premium.title: Premium Domiciliation
domiciliation-premium.text: Give your company the elegance of an address in one of the most coveted neighborhoods of Marrakech.
domiciliation-premium.fullDescription: Premium domiciliation at TAW 10 is not just a mailing address. It is a strategic positioning for your company. We offer you prestigious addresses in Marrakech, strengthening your brand image with your clients and partners. Our service includes mail management, access to modern meeting rooms, and dedicated administrative support.

creation-entreprise.title: Business Creation
creation-entreprise.text: Launch your project in one click. We take care of all formalities for you.
creation-entreprise.fullDescription: Transforming an idea into a business can be complex. Our team of experts accompanies you at every step of the creation process in Morocco. From choosing the legal form (LLC, Self-entrepreneur, etc.) to obtaining the RC and Fiscal Identifier, we manage everything so you can focus on your business.
features: Registration for Professional Tax and IF

secretariat-virtuel.title: Virtual Secretariat
secretariat-virtuel.text: Daily management and digitization of your mail, faxes, and parcels. Your daily reality.
secretariat-virtuel.fullDescription: Manage your business remotely with peace of mind. Our virtual secretariat service ensures continuity for your activity. We answer your calls, manage your appointments, and digitize your mail daily. A complete office at your service, without the fixed costs of a traditional secretariat.

support-juridique.title: Legal Support
support-juridique.text: Statute modifications, head office transfers, share transfers – every step is managed by our experts.
support-juridique.fullDescription: The life of a company is punctuated by changes. Our legal department assists you in all structural modifications: capital increase, head office transfer, manager change, or share transfer. We guarantee the compliance of your acts with current Moroccan legislation.

support-administratif.title: Administrative Support
support-administratif.text: Free yourself from time-consuming administrative tasks with our personalized support service.
support-administratif.fullDescription: Delegate your administration to gain productivity. Our qualified assistants manage your CNSS declarations, your relations with public administrations, and your client follow-ups for you. We become your efficient back-office so you can drive your growth.

conseil-strategique.title: Strategic Consulting
conseil-strategique.text: We accompany you in your company's growth thanks to our development consulting.
conseil-strategique.fullDescription: Make the right decisions at the right time. Our consultants bring an external and expert perspective on your development strategy in Morocco. Market analysis, operational optimization, or funding search, we are by your side to turn your ambitions into lasting success.

WhyUs.title: Why TAW 10?
WhyUs.subtitle: Your Success is Our Only Mission
WhyUs.description: More than just a domiciliation, TAW 10 is the catalyst for your entrepreneurial success in Morocco. State-approved, our center offers you an exceptional environment.
WhyUs.quote: We don't just give you an address; we offer you the prestige and momentum needed to shine.

Pricing.title: Our Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Transparency and Simplicity for All Your Needs
Pricing.description: Packages adapted to every stage of your growth. No hidden fees.

features.domiciliation_12: Domiciliation in a prestigious address (12 months)
features.domiciliation_24: Domiciliation in a prestigious address (24 months)

Process.title: How it works?
Process.subtitle: How it works in 3 steps?
Process.description: Complete our simple and fast form in a few clicks. All procedures are done online.

0.title: Select your address
0.description: Choose one of our prestigious addresses in Marrakech or Laâyoune that best matches your company's image.

1.title: Complete the online form
1.description: Fill out our simple and intuitive form in minutes. All steps are 100% online, with support at every step if needed.

2.title: Receive your instant confirmation
2.description: In less than 10 minutes, get your domiciliation contract and start using your new address to propel your business.

Team.title: Meet Our Experts
Team.subtitle: Discover our team of experts dedicated to your success.
Team.description: Passionate professionals who put their expertise at your service to turn your ideas into success.

hicham.description: CEO of TAW 10, expert in business creation and domiciliation in Morocco.

salma.description: Sales and customer relations specialist, dedicated to your satisfaction.

afafe.description: Experienced office manager, ensuring the smooth running of our services.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.subtitle: What Our Clients Say
Testimonials.description: Discover testimonials from our clients who have benefited from our domiciliation and management services.

0.content: TAW 10 transformed our domiciliation experience. Fast, transparent, and professional – a prestigious address that truly boosts our image!

1.content: Excellent experience with TAW 10. The process is simple, the team is responsive, and the virtual secretariat service is top-notch. Recommended without hesitation.

2.content: TAW 10 offers impeccable domiciliation service. Their personalized administrative support is a real asset for our daily management. Very satisfied!

3.content: Since we chose TAW 10, our company has gained visibility and credibility. Their support is exceptional, and their online service is very practical.

Footer.description: Your trusted partner for business creation and domiciliation in Morocco.
